remarks: Re-index a finite group sum using a bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzf1o as of 2-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzclOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzclOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzclOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzclOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzclOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzclOLD.w $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzf1oOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
gsumzf1oOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( F o. H ) ) ) $.
